scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development ejs-cli src/index.ejs > index.html && NODE_ENV=development concurrently "budo index.js:bundle.js --live --serve bundle.js -- -t babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 stage-1 ] -t envify -t glslify" "postcss src/postcss/index.sss -o main.css -m -w"
scripts.build: concurrently "browserify index.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t glslify -t babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 stage-1 ] | uglifyjs > bundle.min.js " "npm run lint:css && postcss src/postcss/index.sss -o main.css && cssnano < main.css > main.min.css && NODE_ENV=production ejs-cli src/index.ejs > index.html"
